# Package managers {#sec-managers}

## What is the importance of package managers

## Conda environments

What is conda: 

To install conda (the command), miniconda (the lighter distribution).

For Linux x86_64 machine 


::: {.cell hash='package-managers_cache/pdf/unnamed-chunk-1_61dc620d8b5b139724a409e0aee98e21'}

```{.bash .cell-code}
curl -O https://repo.anaconda.com/miniconda/Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh
```
:::


For Mac (Intel, will also works on M1):


::: {.cell hash='package-managers_cache/pdf/unnamed-chunk-2_3e5b3486dd8acb770019086374635695'}

```{.bash .cell-code}
curl -O https://repo.anaconda.com/miniconda/Miniconda3-latest-MacOSX-x86_64.sh
```
:::


Once downloaded, the next step is to run the installation script.


::: {.cell hash='package-managers_cache/pdf/unnamed-chunk-3_7e4ab67e38e2da569cadca7ea8bc14cb'}

```{.bash .cell-code}
bash Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh
```
:::


After installation is completed, it is recommended to add the following channels to your conda configuration. Conda channels are... 


::: {.cell hash='package-managers_cache/pdf/unnamed-chunk-4_1e483c68fded64fa9a4b5cdb18c86b5d'}

```{.bash .cell-code}
conda config --add channels defaults
conda config --add channels bioconda
conda config --add channels conda-forge
```
:::


After this, conda should be installed, you may need to restart your terminal.

::: {.callout-tip}
A faster implementation of the `conda` command is `mamba`. To install it simply run `conda install mamba` and then every time you will install a program just substitute `conda` for `mamba`
:::

## Package managers for OS

There are several package managers handling general purpose packages and apps. For MacOS the famous one is [Homebrew]() and for Windows several could be used such as [Chocolatey]() and [Scoop](https://scoop.sh/).
